item.title: The New .slnx Solution Format (migration guide)
item.description: See what changes in .slnx, how to convert your existing .sln, and what to watch out for in CI. Link to article: https://www.milanjovanovic.tech/blog/the-new-slnx-solution-format-migration-guide
